column1: 82114013$Sea Dragoons of Draconia$Unlimited$WATER$[Sea Serpent/Pendulum/Normal]$$$$7$3$200$2100$$$When a monster is destroyed by battle: You can Special Summon 1 Normal Monster from your hand. You can only use this effect of "Sea Dragoons of Draconia" once per turn.$Silently creeping in from the deep sea
column2: elite black ops marine troops of the Draconia Empire wage an endless battle against the hated Principality of Dinon on the sea's opposite shores.$Normal Monster$$$Pendulum Effect /Trigger-like/Condition$
